data.actual_result: some of the users/roles that is not existing in the server will be included in the suggestion list.
data.expected_result: the members/roles should exist in the suggestion list
data.short_description: you can mention users/roles that does not exists in your server in overlay interface.
data.steps_to_repro: - open overlay from a game. go to a text channel - go to first server. leave @ in the text field - go to second server. do the same thing - go back to the first server. observe
